price: 40. Ezali (Allah) te nde azali na bokoki ya kosekwisa bawei?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
